verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> which <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> which <S%H3427>dwell<s%> at <S%H4024>Migdol,<s%> and at <S%H8471>Tahpanhes,<s%> and at <S%H5297>Noph,<s%> and in the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H6624>Pathros,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> You have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that I have <S%H935>brought<s%> on <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> they are a <S%H2723>desolation,<s%> and <S%H369>no<s%> man <S%H3427>dwells<s%> therein,

<S%H6440>Because<s%> of their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H6213>committed<s%> to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger,<s%> in that they <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H6999>incense,<s%> and to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> they <S%H3045>knew<s%> not, neither they, you, nor your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

However, I <S%H7971>sent<s%> to you <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H7925>rising<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H7971>sending<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4994>Oh,<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> not <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H8441>abominable<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> that I <S%H8130>hate.<s%>

But they <S%H8085>listened<s%> not, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5186>inclined<s%> their <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H7725>turn<s%> from their <S%H7451>wickedness,<s%> to <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%>

Why my <S%H2534>fury<s%> and my <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H5413>poured<s%> forth, and was <S%H1197>kindled<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and they are <S%H2723>wasted<s%> and <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> as at <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Therefore <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H6213>commit<s%> you this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> your <S%H5315>souls,<s%> to <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from you <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H5768>child<s%> and <S%H3243>suckling,<s%> out of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> to <S%H3498>leave<s%> you <S%H1115>none<s%> to <S%H7611>remain;<s%>

In that you provoke me to <S%H3707>wrath<s%> with the <S%H4639>works<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands,<s%> <S%H6999>burning<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you be <S%H935>gone<s%> to <S%H1481>dwell,<s%> that you might <S%H3772>cut<s%> yourselves off, and that you might be a <S%H7045>curse<s%> and a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth?<s%>

Have you <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of their <S%H802>wives,<s%> and your own <S%H7451>wickedness,<s%> and the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of your <S%H802>wives,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H6213>committed<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem?<s%>

They are not <S%H1792>humbled<s%> even to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> have they <S%H3372>feared,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> in my <S%H8451>law,<s%> nor in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> that I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you and <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H7760>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against you for <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and to <S%H3772>cut<s%> off <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

And I will <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> that have <S%H7760>set<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and they shall <S%H3605>all<s%> be <S%H8552>consumed,<s%> and <S%H5307>fall<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> they shall even be <S%H8552>consumed<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> and by the <S%H7458>famine:<s%> they shall <S%H4191>die,<s%> from the <S%H6996>least<s%> even to the <S%H1419>greatest,<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> and by the <S%H7458>famine:<s%> and they shall be an <S%H423>execration,<s%> and an <S%H8047>astonishment,<s%> and a <S%H7045>curse,<s%> and a <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>

For I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> as I have <S%H6485>punished<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> by the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and by the <S%H1698>pestilence:<s%>

So that <S%H3808>none<s%> of the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> which are <S%H935>gone<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> shall <S%H6412>escape<s%> or <S%H8300>remain,<s%> that they should <S%H7725>return<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> to the <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H5375>have<s%> a <S%H5375>desire<s%> <S%H5315><s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H8033>there:<s%> for <S%H3808>none<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> but such as shall <S%H6412>escape.<s%>

Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> which <S%H3045>knew<s%> that their <S%H802>wives<s%> had <S%H6999>burned<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> that <S%H5975>stood<s%> by, a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6951>multitude,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> in <S%H6624>Pathros,<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
As for the <S%H1697>word<s%> that you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to us in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> we will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to you.

But we will certainly <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853>whatever<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3318>goes<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of our own <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> to <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> to the <S%H4446>queen<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and to <S%H5258>pour<s%> out <S%H5262>drink<s%> offerings to her, as we have <S%H6213>done,<s%> we, and our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> our <S%H4428>kings,<s%> and our <S%H8269>princes,<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> for then <S%H1961>had<s%> we <S%H7646>plenty<s%> of <S%H3899>victuals,<s%> and were <S%H2896>well,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

But <S%H4480>since<s%> <S%H227><s%> we <S%H2308>left<s%> off to <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> to the <S%H4446>queen<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and to <S%H5258>pour<s%> out <S%H5262>drink<s%> offerings to her, we have <S%H2637>wanted<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> things, and have been <S%H8552>consumed<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> and by the <S%H7458>famine.<s%>

And <S%H3588>when<s%> we <S%H6999>burned<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> to the <S%H4446>queen<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H5258>poured<s%> out <S%H5262>drink<s%> offerings to her, did we <S%H6213>make<s%> her <S%H3561>cakes<s%> to <S%H6087>worship<s%> her, and <S%H5258>pour<s%> out <S%H5262>drink<s%> offerings to her, <S%H1107>without<s%> our <S%H582>men?<s%>

Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> to the <S%H1397>men,<s%> and to the <S%H802>women,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> which had given him that <S%H6030>answer,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

The <S%H7002>incense<s%> that you <S%H6999>burned<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> you, and your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> your <S%H4428>kings,<s%> and your <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> did not the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> them, and <S%H5927>came<s%> it not <S%H5921>into<s%> his <S%H3820>mind?<s%>

So that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H5375>bear,<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of your <S%H4611>doings,<s%> and <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H6213>committed;<s%> therefore is your <S%H776>land<s%> a <S%H2723>desolation,<s%> and an <S%H8047>astonishment,<s%> and a <S%H7045>curse,<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> an <S%H3427>inhabitant,<s%> as at <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H6440>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you have <S%H6999>burned<s%> <S%H6999>incense,<s%> and <S%H834>because<s%> you have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> in his <S%H8451>law,<s%> nor in his <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> nor in his <S%H5715>testimonies;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3652><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> is <S%H7122>happened<s%> to you, as at <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Moreover <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H802>women,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> that are in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying;<s%> You and your <S%H802>wives<s%> have both <S%H1696>spoken<s%> with your <S%H6310>mouths,<s%> and <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> with your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> We will surely <S%H6213>perform<s%> our <S%H5088>vows<s%> that we have <S%H5087>vowed,<s%> to <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> to the <S%H4446>queen<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and to <S%H5258>pour<s%> out <S%H5262>drink<s%> offerings to her: you will surely <S%H6965>accomplish<s%> your <S%H5088>vows,<s%> and surely <S%H6213>perform<s%> your <S%H5088>vows.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> you the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by my <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that my <S%H8034>name<s%> shall <S%H518>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> be <S%H7121>named<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> <S%H2416>lives.<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H8245>watch<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them for <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and not for <S%H2896>good:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> that are in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall be <S%H8552>consumed<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> and by the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> there be an <S%H3615>end<s%> of them.

Yet a <S%H4962>small<s%> <S%H4557>number<s%> that <S%H6412>escape<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> that are <S%H935>gone<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4310>whose<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand,<s%> mine, or <S%H1992>their's.<s%>

And <S%H2063>this<s%> shall be a <S%H226>sign<s%> to you, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> you in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that my <S%H1697>words<s%> shall surely <S%H6965>stand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you for <S%H7451>evil:<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H6548>Pharaohhophra<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of them that <S%H1245>seek<s%> his <S%H5315>life;<s%> as I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> his <S%H341>enemy,<s%> and that <S%H1245>sought<s%> his <S%H5315>life.<s%>
